# Setup New Machine

- Install
    - VSCode
        - LaTeX
        - Git
        - Python
            
            ```cpp
            python -m pip install --upgrade pip
            pip install python-Levenshtein
            pip install jupyter
            pip install pyperclip
            ```
            
    - Visual Studio
    - Notion
    - PyCharm
    - Office
    - WeChat
    - Windows Terminal
    - K-Lite Codec

## Change My Documents location

`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\User Shell Folders`
